answer: <p>Using the former isn't inherently more safe than the latter, you need to sanitize the input whether it's part of a parameter array or a simple variable.  So I don't see anything wrong with using the latter form with <code>$table</code>, provided you make sure that the content of <code>$table</code> is safe (alphanum plus underscores?) before using it.</p>
